summary: Add a higher class vampire follower using cbbe vanilla body
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b][size=5]Ruby the Nightlord Standalone Follower
[/size][/b]
Add a higher class vampire follower using cbbe vanilla body

Name: Ruby the Nightlord
Race: Female Nord Vampire
Body: CBBE Vanilla
Mood: Disgusted
Essential: False
Marriageable: True

Stats: Levels 25 -150
Class: [size=3]Spellsword[/size]
Combat Style: Spellsword

Default Outfit: None
Inventory: Ruby Vampire Outfit
Upgradable: True
Craftable: False

Weapon: Elven sword
Spell: Ruby Vampire Drain[b]
[/b]Perk: Light Armor[b]

[b]Location:
[/b][/b]Trap Door inside Falkreath Hall of the Dead near the altar

[size=3][b]Required :
[/b]Skyrim.esm
Dawnguard.esm[b]

[/b][/size][size=3][b][b]Installation : [/b]
[/b]NMM or copy to data folder[b]

[b]Uninstall : [/b]
[/b]Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder[b]
[/b]
